content: quote: Originally posted by EAG154: "http://news.yahoo.com/s/nm/20090307/pl_nm/us_obama_5 Mr. Obama you can't fix the economy by raising taxes and spreading the wealth. Does 'whatever it take' include mountains of debt with no policy to pay it off? His plan is a pipe dream. A better way to solve some of the health care costs would be to reform the legal system to reduce mal-practice premiums. Too many lawyers in DC to correct that however.
